K\u1EF9 thu\u1EADt C\xF4ng nghi\u1EC7p \u0111\u01B0\u1EE3c th\xE0nh l\u1EADp theo Quy\u1EBFt \u0111\u1ECBnh s\u1ED1: 358/Q\u0110-\u0110HKTKTCN ng\xE0y 04 th\xE1ng 08 n\u0103m 2020 c\u1EE7a Hi\u1EC7u tr\u01B0\u1EDFng, tr\xEAn c\u01A1 s\u1EDF t\xE1ch ra t\u1EEB t\u1ED5 Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n tr\u1EF1c thu\u1ED9c ph\xF2ng \u0110\xE0o t\u1EA1o tr\u01B0\u1EDBc \u0111\xE2y, tr\u1EDF th\xE0nh m\u1ED9t \u0111\u01A1n v\u1ECB \u0111\u1ED9c l\u1EADp. Trung t\xE2m Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n \u0111\u01B0\u1EE3c L\xE3nh \u0111\u1EA1o Tr\u01B0\u1EDDng \u0111\u1ECBnh h\u01B0\u1EDBng ph\xE1t tri\u1EC3n theo m\xF4 h\xECnh l\u1EA5y B\u1EA1n \u0111\u1ECDc l\xE0m trung t\xE2m, \u0111\u01B0\u1EE3c Nh\xE0 tr\u01B0\u1EDDng \u0111\u1EA7u t\u01B0 n\xE2ng c\u1EA5p, x\xE2y d\u1EF1ng trong th\u1EDDi gian v\u1EEBa qua t\u1EA1o n\xEAn m\u1ED9t kh\xF4ng gian gi\xE1o d\u1EE5c, trong \u0111\xF3 c\xF3 c\xE1c thi\u1EBFt b\u1ECB chuy\xEAn d\xF9ng hi\u1EC7n \u0111\u1EA1i, h\u1EA1 t\u1EA7ng m\u1EA1ng, kh\xF4ng gian m\u1EDF, ph\xF2ng \u0111\u1ECDc, ph\xF2ng h\u1ECDc nh\xF3m, ph\xF2ng h\u1ED9i th\u1EA3o v\xE0 ph\xF2ng t\u1EF1 h\u1ECDc, ph\u1EE5c v\u1EE5 t\u1ED1t nh\u1EA5t cho B\u1EA1n \u0111\u1ECDc \u0111\u1EBFn v\u1EDBi Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n. Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n \xE1p d\u1EE5ng khung ph\xE2n lo\u1EA1i DDC, ti\xEAu chu\u1EA9n qu\u1ED1c t\u1EBF v\u1EC1 m\xF4 t\u1EA3 bi\xEAn m\u1EE5c AACR2 v\xE0 ti\xEAu chu\u1EA9n Dublin Core \u0111\u1EC3 n\xE2ng cao hi\u1EC7u qu\u1EA3 ho\u1EA1t \u0111\u1ED9ng Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n. Hi\u1EC7n nay, Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n c\xF3 s\u1ED1 l\u01B0\u1EE3ng t\xE0i li\u1EC7u in v\u1EDBi h\u01A1n 10.000 \u0111\u1EA7u s\xE1ch, v\u1EDBi nhi\u1EC1u ch\u1EE7 \u0111\u1EC1 kh\xE1c nhau, \u2026 c\xF3 g\u1EA7n 4.000 b\u1EA3n t\xE0i li\u1EC7u s\u1ED1 bao g\u1ED3m Gi\xE1o tr\xECnh, T\xE0i li\u1EC7u h\u1ECDc t\u1EADp, Kh\xF3a lu\u1EADn t\u1ED1t nghi\u1EC7p v\xE0 Lu\u1EADn v\u0103n th\u1EA1c s\u0129. Ngo\xE0i ra, Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n c\u0169ng c\xF3 c\xE1c CSDL li\xEAn k\u1EBFt trong n\u01B0\u1EDBc v\xE0 qu\u1ED1c t\u1EBF nh\u01B0: T\xE0i nguy\xEAn s\u1ED1 c\u1EE7a Trung t\xE2m Truy\u1EC1n th\xF4ng v\xE0 Tri th\u1EE9c s\u1ED1 - \u0110\u1EA1i h\u1ECDc B\xE1ch Khoa HN; Trung t\xE2m k\u1EBFt n\u1ED1i Tri th\u1EE9c s\u1ED1; CSDL \u0111i\u1EC7n t\u1EED EBSCO; CSDL \u0111i\u1EC7n t\u1EED Springer v\u1EDBi 1699 t\xE0i li\u1EC7u \u0111\u01B0\u1EE3c nh\xE0 tr\u01B0\u1EDDng mua quy\u1EC1n truy c\u1EADp v\u0129nh vi\u1EC5n. Kh\xF3a lu\u1EADn t\u1ED1t nghi\u1EC7p v\xE0 Lu\u1EADn v\u0103n th\u1EA1c s\u0129 \u0111\u01B0\u1EE3c ph\xE2n lo\u1EA1i v\xE0 s\u1EAFp x\u1EBFp theo khung ph\xE2n lo\u1EA1i DDC d\u1EC5 t\xECm, d\u1EC5 s\u1EED d\u1EE5ng v\u1EDBi c\xE1c l\u0129nh v\u1EF1c v\u1EC1 Kinh t\u1EBF, K\u1EF9 thu\u1EADt, \u2026 V\u1EDBi \u0111\u1ECBnh h\u01B0\u1EDBng l\u1EA5y B\u1EA1n \u0111\u1ECDc l\xE0m trung t\xE2m, Nh\xE0 tr\u01B0\u1EDDng ti\u1EBFp t\u1EE5c tri\u1EC3n khai x\xE2y d\u1EF1ng Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n m\u1EDBi t\u1EA1i c\u01A1 s\u1EDF H\xE0 N\u1ED9i trong th\u1EDDi gian t\u1EDBi. T\u1EA1o n\xEAn gi\u1EA3ng \u0111\u01B0\u1EDDng th\u1EE9 2 th\u1EF1c s\u1EF1 tho\u1EA3i m\xE1i, v\u0103n minh, hi\u1EC7n \u0111\u1EA1i v\xE0 k\u1EBFt n\u1ED1i cho Sinh vi\xEAn v\xE0 B\u1EA1n \u0111\u1ECDc n\xF3i chung. Trung t\xE2m Th\u01B0 vi\u1EC7n hi\u1EC7n t\u1EA1i v\u1EDBi \u0111\u1ED9i ng\u0169 c\xE1n b\u1ED9 l\xE0 13 ng\u01B0\u1EDDi, \u0111\u01B0\u1EE3c ph\xE2n c\xF4ng t\u1EA1i 03 \u0111\u1ECBa \u0111i\u1EC3m l\xE0m vi\u1EC7c c\u1EE7a Tr\u01B0\u1EDDng, \u0111\u1EA3m b\u1EA3o \u0111\u1EE7 ti\xEAu ch\xED v\u1EC1 chuy\xEAn m\xF4n nghi\u1EC7p v\u1EE5 \u0111\u1EC3 ph\u1EE5c v\u1EE5 B\u1EA1n \u0111\u1ECDc v\u1EDBi ph\u01B0\u01A1ng ch\xE2m: \u201CVUI V\u1EBA - T\u1EACN T\xC2M - K\u1EBET N\u1ED0I - V\u0102N MINH\u201D."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:cx('section-heading'),onClick:()=>toggleSection('services'),children:"D\u1ECBch v\u1EE5 n\u1ED5i b\u1EADt"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:cx('services-grid',{active:activeSection==='services'}),children:libraryInfo.services.map((service,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cx('service-card'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:cx('service-icon'),children:"\uD83D\uDCDA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:service})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:cx('section-heading'),children:"Li\xEAn h\u1EC7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cx('contact-info'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cx('contact-item'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:cx('contact-icon'),children:"\uD83D\uDCCD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:libraryInfo.location})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cx('contact-item'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:cx('contact-icon'),children:"\u2709\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"thuvien@uneti.edu.vn"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cx('contact-item'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:cx('contact-icon'),children:"\uD83D\uDCDE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"0988-123-456"})]})]})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:cx('footer'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})})]});};export default LibraryIntro;
